fields.description: Indicates the original record from which this entry was amended.
fields.label: Amended From

fields.description: Specifies whether this log is for vehicle/material entry or exit.
fields.label: Entry/Exit

fields.description: Date on which the gate entry or exit took place.
fields.label: Date

fields.description: Supplier associated with the referenced document.
fields.label: Supplier

fields.description: Any additional external reference number, document, or remark relevant to this gate entry.
fields.label: Other Reference

fields.description: Specifies whether the materials or items are returnable or non-returnable.
fields.label: Type

fields.description: Time at which the gate entry or exit was recorded.
fields.label: Posting Time

fields.description: Customer associated with the referenced document.
fields.label: Customer

fields.description: Registration number of the vehicle entering or exiting through the gate.
fields.label: Vehicle No.

fields.description: Specifies the mode of transportation used for material movement.
fields.label: Mode of Transport

fields.description: Linked driver responsible for the transport vehicle.
fields.label: Driver

fields.description: Full name of the vehicle driver (auto-filled if linked).
fields.label: Driver Name

fields.description: Address or location details relevant to the transporter or delivery point.
fields.label: Address

fields.description: Table capturing item details like description, quantity, and unit for this gate entry.
fields.label: Items

fields.description: Document type that this gate entry log is linked to (e.g., Purchase Order, Sales Order, etc.).
fields.label: Reference Doctype
fields.options:
Purchase Order
Sales Order
Subcontracting Order
Material Request

fields.description: Select the specific document record based on the chosen reference doctype.
fields.label: Document
